Demonslayer's Hindrance.name: Demonslayer's Hindrance
Demonslayer's Hindrance.flavor: You deal crippling blows to two different adversaries.
Demonslayer's Hindrance.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Demonslayer's Hindrance.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
    If the target is a demon, it takes 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack, and it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Demonward.name: Demonward
Demonward.flavor: You quickly adapt to the energy your attacker is using against you.
Demonward.trigger: You take damage of a specific type, such as radiant or fire
Demonward.effect: You gain resist 15 against damage of that type or types until the end of your next turn.

Demonbane Flurry.name: Demonbane Flurry
Demonbane Flurry.flavor: Your weapons work in deadly concert to unravel the very essence of your foe and singe its nearby allies.
Demonbane Flurry.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Demonbane Flurry.onHit:
3[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack, and the first attack that hits also deals ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
    If the target is a demon, in addition this damage ignores all resistances, and until the end of this encounter, when the demon takes ongoing damage, its allies within 2 squares take the same amount of damage.
